document_data.caption: A map showing Nuulatha in southwest Halruaa.
document_data.name: Nuulatha
document_data.mainbody: '''Nuulatha''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Nuulatha was located in southwest Halruaa. The coastal town lay on the shores of the western region of the [[Bay of Taertal]] along the [[Great Sea]].
